page.title: 05LIFE STYLES
page.content:
MR.&MRS.WYATT
Mr.& Mrs.Wyatt live at 102 High Street,Landbeach.When we went in Mrs. Wyatt showed us into her living room. On their farm they told us that they do not have any animals.We asked her" Who helps you on the farm".She replied"My son,my husband and my myself".The second question we asked her was"Do you sell your own products".She again replied "Yes,that is how I earn my living".Next we asked her was "How many acres of land do you own"and the anwser was"I farm 100 acres".The second from last question was"Who do you sell your products to". She replied that by saying"To a merchant".Then she told us about her indoor animals.
